text: Va [şumo mardon] harcand ʙikūşed, hargiz nametavoned [az nazari muhaʙʙati qalʙī] mijoni zanon adolat ʙarqaror kuned, pas, jaksara [ʙa jake majl nakuned va] az jake rū nagardoned, ki ūro ʙilotaklif raho kuned. Va agar soziş namoed va parhezgorī kuned, ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
